name: Spicy Shrimp Burgers (Rachel Ray)
ingredients: 1/2 tsp cayenne or 1 tsp Tabasco hot sauce
1/4 cups chili sauce or salsa or taco sauce
instructions: Put half the shrimp into food processor and grind it up.
Add remaining whole shrimp to bowl.
Add celery, onion, bell pepper, garlic, parsley to processor and grind it into a fine chop.
Add old bay, cayenne, lemon zest, salt and pepper to bowl to season.
Using a large scoop, scoop 4 mounds of shrimp mix into pan.
Fry 3-5 minutes on each side, until they firm up and shrimp turn whitish pink.
Split and toast muffins or buns.
Place burger on bun bottom top with lettuce, sauce and top of bun.
